DOC.HEADLINE: OC HIGH / STUDENT NEWS AND VIEWS ; INLINE ; STANDING_FIRM
DOC.TEXT: The Capistrano Unified School District has gone_on record against music and videotapes or computer_games that depict or promote the killing of human_beings , celebrate violence or desensitize children to the value of human life . " There is an emerging body of evidence that indicates that there are links that exist between increased use by children of computerized games which simulate killing " and a lack of respect for human life , the district said in a written statement . " The additional negative influence of music and related videotapes that promote violence or celebrate killing adds_to an unhealthy environment which may lead children to accept violence as a common fact of life in society. "
